table.name: item
table.description: This is the item master table. It defines the various items in the customer's database. The item can be defined in various governmental classification categories. GC3 includes the categories to represent NMFC, STCC, HTS and SITC. Other details like, minimum, maximum shipping units, pallet size etc. are also defined in this table.

columns.name: ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item.

columns.name: ITEM_XID
columns.description: The XID for the item.

columns.name: ITEM_NAME
columns.description: Text for the name of the item.

columns.name: COMMODITY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the commodity.

columns.name: NMFC_ARTICLE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the National Motor Freight Classification (NMFC) article/item number. The NMFC article refers to the NMFC's standard grouping of items, for example the article Brick(s): Thermal energy storage, ceramic is identified with the item number of 32270. The intended use for this table is to assign the item number related to the NMFC article as the ID for the NMFC Article XID. Note that within the system the NMFC article and the relationship between the article and the NMFC freight class are for information only.

columns.name: NMFC_CLASS_GID
columns.description: The GID for the National Motor Freight Classification (NMFC). The NMFC is a critical piece of information used for rating Less-Than-Truckload shipments in North America. If you intend to rate shipments using RATEWAREXL or RATEWAREXL WITH CARRIERCONNECT it's important that the NMFC class information entered is a standard NMFC freight class - for example, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70, 77.5 etc.

columns.name: STCC_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Standard Commodity Code (STCC).

columns.name: HTS_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Harmonized Tariff System (HTS).

columns.name: SITC_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Standard International Trade Classification (SITC).

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: A description of the item being shipped.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED_COMMODITY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user-defined commodity.

columns.name: UDC_CLASSIFICATION_LIST_GID
columns.description: List of User Defined commodities for item.

columns.name: BRAND_NAME
columns.description: The brand name is an informational text field and allows you to enter the brand name for an item.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date is used to set the start time window for when an item should be used on an order.

columns.name: EXPIRATION_DATE
columns.description: The expiration date is used to set the end time window for when an item should be used on an order.

columns.name: MANUFACTURED_COUNTRY_CODE_GID
columns.description: Legacy field used to identify an items manufactured country code. GTM now supports the concept of manufactured country code in a more robust fashion. This field is no longer used or visible on the UI.

columns.name: IS_DRAWBACK
columns.description: Legacy field used to identify items that were to be tracked for duty drawback opportunities. This field is no longer used or visible on the UI.

columns.name: IATA_SCR_CODE_GID
columns.description: Legacy field that was used to capture the IATA source code. This fields is no longer used for visible on the UI.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A Boolean field. When it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: UNIT_OF_MEASURE
columns.description: The price per unit of measure.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT
columns.description: The price per unit based on the unit of measure selected.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_BASE
columns.description: The price per unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PRICE_PER_UNIT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the price per unit.

columns.name: IS_TEMPLATE
columns.description: Check box indicating whether or not this item record will be used as an item template or not.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: Indicators are icons that can be assigned to business objects that can be displayed in search Results pages and other lists to indicate the condition or state of a business object. You can use indicators to mark the history, status or any other condition of a business object.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five User-Defined Image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon.
